gallery.beans

Class JobBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • gallery.beans.JobBean

  • public class JobBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Enterprise Java Bean that starts jobs mostly on location level.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()

      • addPhotographs

        public void addPhotographs(Location location)
        Checks a directory stored in "location" for new photographs or films. Will start walking the directory tree.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that *may* have new photographs.

      • importPhotographs

        public java.lang.String importPhotographs(Gallery found,
                                 java.lang.String location)
        Imports photographs/films matching a certain mask (location) into an existing gallery.
        Parameters:
        found - the gallery to import photographs into
        location - the location that should match, can use SQL wildcards like %
        Returns:
        a String, error message or null if successful.

      • verifyPhotographs

        public void verifyPhotographs(Location location)
        Verifies existing Photographs upon a Location. Do they exist on the hard drive as well, do the hashes correspond? Will put error messages in the log, for each Photograph so they can be fixed later by the user.
        Parameters:
        location - the location at which the photographs need to be checked

      • initGalleries

        public void initGalleries(Location location)
        Creates galleries and adds photographs to them, based on the information in the photographs at a certain location. Names of the galleries will be based on the path in the file structure.
        Parameters:
        location - all photographs at this location will be used.
